meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Neo-Nazis Convicted Three young German neo-Nazis were convicted of murder for beating an African immigrant to death, and one of them was sentenced to life imprisonment, the most severe punishment allowed.

Neo-Nazis Convicted Three young German neo-Nazis were convicted of murder for beating an African immigrant to death, and one of them was sentenced to life imprisonment, the most severe punishment allowed.

Religion's Many Faces The Millennium World Peace Summit of Religious and Spiritual Leaders has brought together people as distinguished by their professed good intentions as by the diversity of their theologies and dress.

A Father's Life Revealed No writer seems to value his privacy more than J. D. Salinger, and now it is being betrayed by one of his own: his daughter, Margaret, whose memoir, ''Dream Catcher,'' is due out on Wednesday.
